{"id":656908232,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1646879399,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"32 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/656908232/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"71.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        ListNode* l = new ListNode();\n        auto head = l;\n        int carry = 0;\n        while(l1!=nullptr || l2!=nullptr){\n            l->next = new ListNode();\n            l=l->next;\n            if(l1==nullptr){\n                l->val = l2->val + carry;\n                carry = 0;\n                if(l->val>=10){\n                    l->val-=10;\n                    carry = 1;\n                }\n                l2 = l2->next;\n            }\n            else if(l2==nullptr){\n                l->val = l1->val + carry;\n                carry = 0;\n                if(l->val>=10){\n                    l->val-=10;\n                    carry = 1;\n                }\n                l1 = l1->next;\n            }\n            else{\n                l->val = l1->val + l2->val + carry;\n                carry = 0;\n                if(l->val>=10){\n                    l->val-=10;\n                    carry = 1;\n                }\n                l1 = l1->next;\n                l2 = l2->next;\n            }\n        }\n        if(carry == 1){\n            l->next = new ListNode();\n            l->next->val = 1;\n        }\n        return head->next;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
